verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: hosts] [ARG1: his administration 's first iftar , the meal that breaks fasts for Muslims during the holy month of Ramadan] .
President Trump hosts his administration 's first iftar , [ARG0: the meal] [R-ARG0: that] [V: breaks] [ARG1: fasts for Muslims] [ARGM-TMP: during the holy month of Ramadan] .
